attributes.name: isTeacher
attributes.description: Does this employment represent a teacher.

attributes.name: employmentPercent
attributes.description: Employment as percentage of a full time employment.

attributes.name: startDate
attributes.description: Start date (ISO8601 format, e.g. "2016-10-15") for this employment.

attributes.name: endDate
attributes.description: End date (ISO8601 format, e.g. "2016-10-15") for this employment.

attributes.name: hoursPerYear
attributes.description: Employment in working hours per year for this employment.

attributes.name: user
attributes.description: The employed user. This can be empty for vacant employments.

subAttributes.name: $ref
subAttributes.description: The URI of the corresponding 'User' resource

subAttributes.name: displayName
subAttributes.description: A human-readable name, primarily used for display purposes.  READ-ONLY.
